Most Illustrious Sir

The office of Your Lordship of the 29th of the past month was presented to the Government, and with it I have secured Hipólito José Pereira Dutra, whom I now send escorted to the army, with a copy of Your Lordship's office, Sir.

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of War Affairs in Caçapava, May 9, 1840. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. Office of the Most Excellent Minister of War of May 9, received on the 15th of the same month, acknowledging receipt of the prisoner Hipólito. Colonel Vieira.
